name: Interactive Baby Yoda - The Mandalorian Fan Game
name_original: Interactive Baby Yoda - The Mandalorian Fan Game
description:
Hi all! 

Thought I'd make something in commemoration of the huge meme that is The Child/Baby Yoda from The Mandalorian Star Wars series! I always found the character a bit offputting because it never talks but seems to hold great power and decided to make something short about it over the weekend! 

Warning: Some flashing images + horror. 

Gameplay: Click to post Baby Yoda memes! 

Time: 3 hours 
Tool: Animate CC 

Let me know what you think!
